songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Girl, I got some money in my pockets (in my pockets)
Do You wanna roll out with me? Yea (me yea) lets go!
Baby, Im a playa you can't knock it (you can't knock it)
And Im just tryna get in between yea (yea)

I pull up to the club in that beamer oh my gosh
Niggas looking like they never seen this kinda car
Who is that the R.? hes a superstar
Twelve play fourth quarter and you know im going hard
Theres so many choices, its hard for me to choose
I just left one club so im already off the booze
Straight up twelve oclock I got shawty in my view
I steps up to her and say shawty what it do?

[Pre Chorus]
She started backing it, I started smacking it
She started clapping it, I started grabbing it
And then I whispered in her ear, and told her lets get outta here
Wanna take you home with me girl

[Chorus]
Girl, I want yo (body body) Do you want my (body body)?
Wanna do something to (your body body), Wanna do something to (my body body)?
Im kissing (your body body) Youre kissing (my body body)
Im wanting (your body body) Youre wanting (my body body)
Oh lets get it Oh lets get it
Oh lets get it Oh lets get it
Oh lets get it Oh lets get it
Oh lets get it Oh lets get it, shawty

I know whip must look unreal when youre looking from the outside
See that bentley coupe with that boy on the inside
Step out so smooth, walking so fly
Yea you got a man but he ain't focused like R
Ain't rollin like R. Spend money like R
Bend you over, pull your hair and stroke it like R
These vezo jeans rocking stilletos
Plus you so hood, word to the ghetto

[Pre Chorus]
She started backing it, I started smacking it
She started clapping it, I started grabbing it
And then I whispered in her ear, and told her lets get outta here
Wanna take you home with me girl

[Chorus]
Girl, I want yo (body body) Do you want my (body body)?
Wanna do something to (your body body), Wanna do something to (my body body)?
Im kissing (your body body) Youre kissing (my body body)
Im wanting (your body body) Youre wanting (my body body)
Oh lets get it Oh lets get it
Oh lets get it Oh lets get it
Oh lets get it Oh lets get it
Oh lets get it Oh lets get it, shawty
songs.title: Body Body
